snippet.title: MARS 2120 - New Release Trailer | PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox and Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
The metroidvania adventure MARS 2120 is now available for PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4 , Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.

Explore a post-colonisation Mars, where the once thriving settlers now need rescuing from unknown and enigmatic threats. With incredible elemental abilities, traverse various biomes in your quest to discover the secrets of Mars and save the colony.

In MARS 2120, humanity has successfully colonized various planets in our solar system, allowing people to escape an increasingly grim situation on Earth. After the UN receives a worrying distress call from Mars, it’s up to Sergeant Anna "Thirteen" Charlotte and an elite team of space marines to answer the call and rescue the first colony. 

MARS 2120 for PC:
https://tinyurl.com/marsytsteam

MARS 2120 for consoles:
Playstation: https://tinyurl.com/mars2120play
Xbox: https://tinyurl.com/marsxbox
Nintendo Switch: https://tinyurl.com/mars2120switch

MARS 2120 website:
http://www.mars2120.com

#metroidvania #scifi #adventure
